caller_intent: Pam is checking in on Gary to ensure he has properly transitioned his insurance policies after retiring and moving, specifically confirming he received non-renewal notices and secured new coverage.
resolution_steps: Gary confirms he handled all insurance transitions himself, including non-renewal from Northwest and securing new homeowner/car insurance.
He reveals he is now working with an independent agent named Tyler (affiliated with Colonial Life) after leaving his previous agency.
Discusses increased insurance costs due to property tax hikes and confirms he found more affordable coverage through his new agent.
knowledge_required: Handling client transitions during agent retirement
Understanding impacts of property tax changes on premiums
summary: Pam checks in with Gary about his insurance status post-retirement, confirming he independently managed policy transitions. Gary reveals he now works with a new agent, Tyler, through Colonial Life, and discusses challenges with rising insurance costs. The conversation highlights client agency transitions and insurance market dynamics.
